body_html: Had a quick discussion with @SsnL , and we agreed on @apaszke 's plan than we should make the kernel smarter to launch different gridDim & blockDim for different input shapes, instead of doing it along dimensions multiple passes. I will go for that direction since it's clean and more efficient. Thanks!
body_text: Had a quick discussion with @SsnL , and we agreed on @apaszke 's plan than we should make the kernel smarter to launch different gridDim & blockDim for different input shapes, instead of doing it along dimensions multiple passes. I will go for that direction since it's clean and more efficient.  Thanks!
body: Had a quick discussion with @SsnL , and we agreed on @apaszke 's plan than we should make the kernel smarter to launch different gridDim & blockDim for different input shapes, instead of doing it along dimensions multiple passes. I will go for that direction since it's clean and more efficient.  Thanks!
